abstract: The cable channel scrapped the show, which was in development, after the promotion of an online petition that condemned Oxygen, accusing it of exploiting and stereotyping black children and families.
snippet: The cable channel scrapped the show, which was in development, after the promotion of an online petition that condemned Oxygen, accusing it of exploiting and stereotyping black children and families.
lead_paragraph: The cable channel Oxygen has scrapped a show in development called “All My Babies’ Mamas” after the promotion of an online petition that condemned the channel, accusing it of exploiting and stereotyping black children and families.

headline.main: Oxygen Drops Plans for ‘All My Babies’ Mamas’
headline.print_headline: Oxygen Kills a Show After Racism Criticism
